mapper.select: INSERT INTO userinfo (USERID, USERPW, USERNAME, USERBIRTH, USERADDR1, USERADDR2, USERPOSTNUM, USERPHONE, USEREMAIL,CATEGORY,USERGRADE) VALUES (#{userid}, #{userpw}, #{username}, #{userbirth} , #{useraddr1}, #{useraddr2}, #{userpostnum}, #{userphone}, #{useremail},#{category},#{userGrade});
SELECT COUNT(USERID) FROM USERINFO WHERE USERID = #{userid};
update userinfo set username=#{username}, useraddr1=#{useraddr1}, useraddr2=#{useraddr2}, userpostnum=#{userpostnum}, useremail=#{useremail} where userid=#{userid}
SELECT COUNT(USERID) FROM USERINFO WHERE USERID=#{userid} AND USERPW = #{userpw};
